name: R2-medication-order-status-for-R3
title: Cross-version VS for R2.MedicationOrderStatus for use in FHIR R3
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents concepts from http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/medication-order-status|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R3. Concepts not present here have direct `equivalent` mappings crossing all versions from R2 to R3.
